description:
In the high-stakes world of sports betting, success hinges on the ability to predict outcomes with precision. Enter AI, which is revolutionising the industry by providing bettors with sophisticated tools to improve their odds. By leveraging data analytics, machine learning, and real-time processing, AI is turning the traditional approach to sports betting on its head.... Read more »

The post How AI is transforming sports betting for better odds appeared first on AI News.
title: How AI is transforming sports betting for better odds

description:
Three hospital systems across England have begun a live clinical trial of AI technology designed to detect and grade prostate cancer. The study – known as ARTICULATE PRO – is being led by the University of Oxford in collaboration with Paige, a pioneer in clinical AI applications for cancer diagnosis. The participating hospitals – North... Read more »

The post UK hospitals begin live trial of prostate cancer-detecting AI appeared first on AI News.
title: UK hospitals begin live trial of prostate cancer-detecting AI
